name: ALIENATED (Nettleroot Games)
description:
This game was created for the blackthornprod gamejam 3: less is more. Everything (from the art to the music and back) was created by us during the gamejam. 

Controls: 

Z : shoot, 

X: jump,

Arrow keys: move and aim.

ALIENATED is a sci-fi platformer that follows the story of a lone astronaut stranded on an aliën planet. After being captured by aliën scientists and surviving several experiments that try to make a living weapon out of him, he manages to escape. He sets out to find his space shuttle, armed with two guns for arms and the strange abillity to become stronger everytime he gets hit. In other words: The less health you have, the more power you gain!
